review: WoW. Brings us into the 21st century. We've long been Netflix users, having the cd's mailed to us. We have not watched television for 10 years or better, so movies or select TV series are our 'thing.' Along with free shipping to our home in Hawaii for most items we order, our Prime membership now means we can eliminate the hassle of waiting for cd's or having to run to our small post office and mail them back. It's like suddenly having someone give us a shower of presents. And set-up is so easy!
author: Bela Johnson "Medical Intuitive/Life Coach"

review: Who needs cable anymore? I love my Fire TV stick and it's saved me from many expensive Redbox bills (I'm very guilty of renting a movie and returning it a week later, sometimes without watching it). The only thing that stinks is that on the Prime TV content, you always have to pay for the most recent season even if all previous seasons are free.
